Tools

Other Visualization Resource Lists

  • Data Visualization Resources: Matt Brehmer’s comprehensive list of useful visualization resources
  • Visualization tools: gallery of software and tools to create visualizations

Plotting in Excel

  • Stephanie Evergreen

Color

  • ColorBrewer: Cynthia Brewer’s color palettes for sequential, diverging, and qualitative data. When in doubt, use Color Brewer.
  • Adobe Color: Adobe site for creating color palettes
  • Color palette analyzer: Evaluate color palettes based on how easy they are to name
  • Color palette examples
  • Matplotlib color schemes: Explanation of how Matplotlib, Python’s visualization function, created color schemes

Fonts and icons

  • Typography: explanation of key terms about fonts and general good practices
  • Humanitarian icons: UN-OCHA free icons for humanitarian symbols
